name: Mothership Strategies
description:
Mothership Strategies is a Washington, DC digital agency rewriting the playbook on how political and advocacy campaigns are won across the nation. Our expert team has raised more than $170 million online, rallied millions of supporters, and built some of the biggest brands in progressive politics.
Founded by Greg Berlin, Jake Lipsett, and Charles Starnes — three of the leading digital organizers in the Democratic Party — Mothership Strategies is dedicated to growing your campaign's online program to its full potential.
